description:
The server appears to start but is configured to refuse to work if accessed by a name other than 'localhost'.
As it is a snap, the files are packaged in a read-only filesystem.
I have not yet figured out how to therefore alter the config.yml file to add more hostnames to allow other computers to use the server without a tunnel.
At this point I have uninstalled the snap version and will instead use a version from the repository.
I must assume I am doing something wrong, as this issue makes the server practically useless, but I am not sure what.
summary: I must be mistaken or this is useless as a snap
